text: Petr Blecha (born 24 April 1970) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Prague
title: Petr Blecha
